entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 3:24 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: WSW 43 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
